Verses: 1 karththar Periyavar, Avar Namadhu Dhevanudaiya Nagaraththilum, Thamadhu Parisuththa Parvadhaththilum Migavum Thudhikkappadaththakkavar.
2 vadadhisaiyilulla Seeyon Parvadham Vadippamaana Sthaanamum Sarvaboomiyin Makizhchchiyumaayirukkiradhu, Adhuve Magaaraajaavin Nagaram.
3 adhin Aramanaigalil Dhevan Uyarndha Adaikkalamaaga Ariyappattirukkiraar.
5 avargal Adhaik Kandabodhu Biramiththuk Kalangi Viraindhodinaargal.
8 naam Kelvippattapadiye Namadhu Dhevanudaiya Nagaramaagiya Senaigaludaiya Karththarin Nagaraththile Kandom; Dhevan Adhai Endrendraikkum Sthirappaduththuvaar. (selaa.)
9 dhevane, Umadhu Aalayaththin Naduvile, Umadhu Kirubaiyaich Sindhiththukkondirukkirom.
10 dhevane, Umadhu Naamam Vilangugiradhupola Umadhu Pukazhchchiyum Boomiyin Kadaiyaandharangal Bariyandhamum Vilangugiradhu; Umadhu Valadhukaram Needhiyaal Niraindhirukkiradhu.
11 ummudaiya Niyaayaththeerppugalinimiththam Seeyon Parvadham Magizhvadhaaga, Yoodhaavin Kumaaraththigal Kalikooruvaargalaaga.
12 seeyonaich Sutri Ulaavi, Adhin Koththalangalai Ennungal.
13 pinvarum Sandhadhikku Neengal Vivarippadharkaaga, Adhin Alangaththaik Gavaniththu, Adhin Aramanaigalai Utruppaarungal.
14 indha Dhevan Endrendraikkumulla Sadhaakaalangalilum Nammudaiya Dhevan; Maranabariyandham Nammai Nadaththuvaar.
